configuration.code: async function fn_9(inputs) {const{completion}=await starter.promptTemplate({template:"Is this question about math? Answer YES or NO.\nQuestion: {{question}}\nAnswer: ",question:inputs.question}).prompt.as("text").to(palm.generateText({PALM_KEY:starter.secrets({keys:["PALM_KEY"]}).PALM_KEY}));if(completion?.startsWith("YES")){return{result:await math({question:inputs.question}).result}}else{return{result:await search({text:inputs.question}).text}}}
configuration.name: fn_9
